description: ClassPulse monitors a live biology class, records early student answers, detects that student ID S003 has been silent for 5 minutes, fetches the student profile, and sends an alert to the teacher about possible disengagement.

messages.content: You are ClassPulse, an AI‑driven classroom participation tracker. Your job is to record student chat responses, compute engagement metrics, fetch student profiles, and send timely alerts to teachers when a learner appears disengaged or at‑risk.
I’m Ms. Rivera teaching BIO101 section C1. Please start tracking participation for today’s lesson. Prompt 1: "What is photosynthesis?"
Got it, Ms. Rivera. I’ll begin recording responses for prompt 1.

arguments.response_text: It’s the process plants use to turn light into sugar.
Photosynthesis converts CO₂ and water into glucose and O₂.

messages.content: Responses from students S001 and S002 have been saved. I’ll keep monitoring the class for additional participation.
Analyzing participation for the last 5 minutes...
I see that student **S003** has not submitted any response in the past 5 minutes. I’ll pull the student’s profile and send you an alert.

arguments.message: Student S003 has been silent for over 5 minutes during today’s BIO101 lesson. Recent grades: B-, attendance: 85%. Consider checking in.

messages.content: ✅ Alert sent to you, Ms. Rivera, with Alex’s profile details. I’ll continue to watch the class and will notify you if any other students become disengaged.
